job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions.
     * Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform.
     * Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Senior Copilot Studio Engineer

* Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions.
     * Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform.
     * Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and deliver high-quality solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes developing virtual assistants for voice and text interactions, integrating features into these assistants, and leveraging platforms like Copilot Studio. This aligns strongly with the definition of a GenAI Engineer who focuses on designing, developing, and deploying applications built on generative models, particularly those involving language and interaction. While there's collaboration and integration, the core focus is on building AI-powered conversational agents, not predictive modeling or traditional data engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions' and 'Integrate banking features into virtual assistants' points to building and enhancing user-facing applications.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop innovative virtual assistants for both voice and text interactions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality' describes the process of embedding specific functionalities into an application.
job_tasks.phrase: Integrate banking features into virtual assistants to enhance customer service and functionality

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements' indicates an understanding of business needs and translating them into technical specifications.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define project requirements

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform' implies working with and potentially fine-tuning or configuring generative AI models within a specific platform.
job_tasks.phrase: leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform

soft_skills.phrase: Guide the team in leveraging the full capabilities of the Copilot Studio platform
